definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw

sentences.english: In 1953, Harman resigned and took Kardon with him.
sentences.chinese: 所以，1953年，他带着卡顿一起引退了。

sentences.english: Washington's "falling" in 1796 was his people's rising.
sentences.chinese: 华盛顿1796年的引退意味着美国人民权力的崛起。

sentences.english: The aging founder of the university decided to abdicate.
sentences.chinese: 该大学年事已高的创始人决定引退。

definition: to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
to die/to depart this mortal coil

pinyin: Ji2 bu3 li4 Gong1 zuo4 shi4

definition: to act as a substitute/to act on sb's behalf
to lift restrictions (such as curfew or martial law)
KOIKE Yuriko (1952-), Japanese LDP politician, minister of defense during 2008
